name: Angeline Era
storyline: Hunt down the beings who plague the esoteric land of Era. Within an intertwined history of Angels, Humans, and Fae, seek the truth of Angeline Era!
summary:
Bump the World! A fast-paced, nonlinear, 3D Bumpslash Action-Adventure with intense boss fights! Venture into an ancient land of Angels and Fae, as you slash and shoot through a lush world filled with outrageous hazards, charming creatures, and unholy abominations. By the creators of Anodyne 2 and Sephonie.

Bump into enemies to automatically attack--no attack button needed! This fast-paced and athletic combat experience is easy to pick up, but difficult to master. Intense boss fights will test your skills!

Explore the nonlinear overworld however you’d like. Challenging, ancient ruins sit near quiet forests, each filled with outrageous hazards, charming creatures, and unholy abominations.

Hunt down the beings who plague the esoteric land of Era. Within an intertwined history of Angels, Humans, and Fae, seek the truth of Angeline Era!
